name: Lizard Lick Towing
overview: Lizard Lick Towing is an American TV series that is filmed in the style of cinema verité. The show is a spin-off of the truTV series All Worked Up, and follows Ron, Amy, Bobby and their team of repossession agents in Wendell, North Carolina. The show is known for the large amount of fights and brawls that take place during the repossessions.

episodes.name: Episode 101
episodes.overview: Ron and Bobby repo a tattoo shop owner's car from the garage at his shop. While Ron's out in the garage, Bobby is left alone to fend off a number of tough tattoo artists and they take him down pretty hard.

episodes.name: Episode 102
episodes.overview: Ron and Bobby must repossess a car from a notorious nut who opens fire on them. Plus, while the guys are out fishing, Amy takes to the streets to retrieve a cable van. And, Ron's dog is snatched by an angry debtor.

episodes.name: Episode 103
episodes.overview: Baby fever hits the office. Plus, Amy punches a debtor who demands to take back his truck. And an evening repo causes Ron to be late for his date with Amy.

episodes.name: Episode 104
episodes.overview: Ronnie and Bobby are accosted by the crazy car owner throwing explosives at them. Plus, the guys are called out for an unusual repo involving a debtor who owes on his land and its occupants. They find themselves in an awkward situation where they must repossess some deer in order to save them from being hunted illegally.

episodes.name: Episode 105
episodes.overview: Ron and Bobby head to a stock car track to repossess a flatbed and truck from a racecar driver. Plus, Ronnie ropes Bobby into helping him with a surprise for Amy and the guys reveal they have redone the nursery for the new baby.

episodes.name: Episode 106
episodes.overview: Friends and family gather for a pig roast hosted by Ron and Amy, and while at the party, Bobby spots a car from a partygoer that's up for repo. Ron is forced to grab a car from his own backyard. Plus, a call comes in from a pal in Miami who needs a hand with a boat repo and Ron and Bobby fly down south dangerously close to Amy's due date. While Ron's out on the water, Amy is left to man the office with just days left till she's due.

episodes.name: Episode 107
episodes.overview: A new chapter begins in the Lizard Lick saga when an old enemy blows into town. It all starts when Ron and Bobby repo a tricked-out truck from flamethrower-packing wannabe military man. Then, back at the office, Ron and Amy grow increasingly annoyed as Bobby becomes more and more distracted by his personal life. And finally, a repo gone bad in a rough part of town sends Ron to the emergency room.

episodes.name: Episode 108
episodes.overview: Tensions at The Lick ride high as Bobby continues to deny any involvement with his ex. Is Amy losing her mind, or is Bobby being less than honest? The team enlists the aid of Big Juicy to ensnare a group of landscapers who haven't been paying for their high-end lawn mowers. Then, Ron and Bobby set out to rescue a car that is being held hostage by a low-rent tow company that's trying to extort the lien-holders out of more money.

episodes.name: Episode 109
episodes.overview: Ron gets put in a dicey spot at a motel during a sting on a sexy escort; a pimp suggests Amy try a new occupation; Ron and Bobby get more than they bargained for at a mud bog, where they've gone to pick up a tricked-out truck; and Amy catches a glimpse of an unusual video in Ron's inbox.

episodes.name: Episode 110
episodes.overview: Ron, at wits end with all the drama Bobby's ex has caused, is forced to declare a "war for Bobby." The boys get caught up in a dangerous situation when they head out to the boonies to repo a truck from a bunch of moonshiners. Then, Amy sends Ron and Bobby to a rodeo to repo a livestock trailer and what they find inside leaves Bobby crooning. Plus, Ron decides to throw Bobby a party in his honor but a surprise guest throws a kink in his plans.

episodes.name: Episode 111
episodes.overview: Tensions are high when Ron gives Bobby an ultimatum that could change Lizard Lick Towing forever. A frisky male debtor comes to the office trying to get his truck back and ends up getting a piece of Amy. Then, a visit from a lien holder brings some unsettling news as some bad rumors have been swirling around Lizard Lick. Meanwhile, Ron and Bobby devise a plan to trick some hippies out of an RV, and finally, a surprise guest at the office throws a wrench Ron's plan to mend his family ties.

episodes.name: Episode 112
episodes.overview: On this thrilling season finale, Ron, Amy, and Bobby's relationship is at a breaking point. First, Ron tells Bobby he has to choose between his family at The Lick and his ex-fiancé. Then, after a job to repossess an arsenal of yard equipment, Bobby and Ron have a confrontation that will change the face of Lizard Lick forever. And, Ron takes Amy along on a motorcycle repo that ends with every repo man's worst nightmare.

episodes.name: Episode 201
episodes.overview: The Season 2 premiere kicks off with stabbing victim Ron on the mend but not quite at full strength, so he and Amy recruit some new help who accompany him to repossess a truck from a firework salesman.

episodes.name: Episode 202
episodes.overview: Bobby's surprise return sparks tension. Elsewhere, Bobby and Ron repossess a tractor from angry farmers and later retrieve an auto from a fight promoter and his violent bodyguard.

episodes.name: Episode 203
episodes.overview: Mounting bills push Bobby and Ron to take on more high-risk repos, which begins with Bobby having revenge on his mind when he sets out to repossess the car of a guy who bullied him as a child. Later, a fuel distributor fumes about Ron's failure to pay his bill and a debtor outsmarts Ron and Bobby during a repo.

episodes.name: Episode 204
episodes.overview: Ron ignores Amy and contemplates Bobby's plan to get them out of debt. Later, Ron and Bobby team up for a high-stakes repo in the backwoods, and Ron meets an acquaintance of Bobby's who has an interesting business proposition.

episodes.name: Episode 205
episodes.overview: First, Ron and Bobby enlist the help of Big Juicy for a tricky repo. Then, a routine tire change leads Ron on a wild goose chase. And finally, a traumatic accident at the end of the repo leaves Ron and Bobby's New Orleans trip in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Episode 206
episodes.overview: Tensions mount as Ron's knee injury puts a wrench in their plans to go to New Orleans.

episodes.name: Episode 208
episodes.overview: Lizard Lick’s time in New Orleans hits another snag when the jobs Ron and Bobby are doing for Dwight get even stranger.

episodes.name: Episode 209
episodes.overview: After a disastrous end to their New Orleans trip, Ron and Bobby are locked in a battle over how to deal with the problem of Dwight.

episodes.name: Episode 210
episodes.overview: With Bobby's truck up in flames, he's out for revenge, and it's up to Ron to hold The Lick together.

episodes.name: Episode 211
episodes.overview: Ron grows aggravated when Bobby is a no-show on a work day.

episodes.name: Episode 212
episodes.overview: Ron faces his first day out of jail with a new resolve; Bobby and Ron head to the backwoods to repossess some tricked-out rims.

episodes.name: Episode 213
episodes.overview: As Ron and Amy make plans to renew their wedding vows Bobby plans a wild and crazy bachelor party.

episodes.name: Episode 214
episodes.overview: In the mid season premiere, a group of irate biker women attack Ron and Bobby; the angry owner of a towed steamroller comes looking for revenge; and a mystery man from the past makes Ron a tempting offer.

episodes.name: Episode 215
episodes.overview: An old buddy of Ron's stirs things up among the crew; a karate expert kicks up a fuss when the guys attempt to repossess his car; Bobby takes a serious hit that could cause problems down the road; Ron attempts a repo at a chicken farm.

episodes.name: Episode 216
episodes.overview: Ron's decision to bring Johnny, his ex-con cousin, into the fold sparks a firestorm with Amy and Bobby. Later, Ron and Bobby get the better of college students at a party.

episodes.name: Episode 217
episodes.overview: Johnny works his charm on Amy, but his cheeky proposal offends her. Elsewhere, Ron and Bobby get caught in the middle of a Civil War reenactment.

episodes.name: Episode 218
episodes.overview: Ronnie plans a team outing to the beach.

episodes.name: Episode 219
episodes.overview: Ron loses a bet and Bobby becomes boss, so the two set out on a repo that results in a fracas with a passel of irate mountain folk.

episodes.name: Episode 220
episodes.overview: Bobby encounters some turbulence during an airplane repo, while back at the office, the new owner engineers some drastic changes to the workplace. Later, Ron and Bobby enlist Amy's help in repoing the tour bus of a country-music star.

episodes.name: Episode 221
episodes.overview: Amy is steamed about being left behind when Ron and Bobby take off for a classic-car show, where they spot a vintage sports car that's up for repossession. Later, Ron sends Amy on a job that leads to an encounter with her former fight rival.

episodes.name: Episode 222
episodes.overview: Bobby has a bear of a time at a pet shop repo, while Amy's time consuming mixed martial arts training keeps her away from work and impacts her marriage.

episodes.name: Episode 223
episodes.overview: Ron and Bobby make a play to repossess a football coach's truck. Later, when Ron doesn't offer any support to Amy in her upcoming martial arts match, she kicks him out of the bedroom.

episodes.name: Episode 224
episodes.overview: Ron, Bobby and Amy recruit NASCAR driver Elliott Sadler to participate in a prank on fellow racer Austin Dillon. Later, the crew discover that a mysterious rival has been stealing business from them.

episodes.name: Episode 225
episodes.overview: Ron refuses an offer to buy Lizard Lick Towing, and the spurned suitor wages an all out war on the crew.

episodes.name: Episode 301
episodes.overview: Ron reconsiders his impetuous decision to sell the company when the new owner threatens to put the entire crew out of work. Meanwhile, a final repo entails picking up a pricey sports car that was abandoned on railroad tracks.

episodes.name: Episode 302
episodes.overview: Lars arrives to assume ownership of the company and is arrested; Juicy gets tossed into the water; and Lars' cars are repossessed. Meanwhile, Ron and Bobby helicopter to a cow field to retrieve a Suburban.

episodes.name: Episode 303
episodes.overview: Ron and Bobby take on new careers as security guards for a mystery celebrity; the boys are forced to repossess a bus filled with senior citizens on a gambling trip.

episodes.name: Episode 304
episodes.overview: Prior to undertaking their first security detail for wrestler Ric Flair, Ron and Bobby find themselves playing chicken with some BMX racers.

episodes.name: Episode 305
episodes.overview: Bobby considers buying a food truck that is going up for auction, and later, he and Ron try to lure debtors out of a locked car.

episodes.name: Episode 306
episodes.overview: A Krazy Dave's family reunion impedes the debut of Ron and Bobbie's food truck.

episodes.name: Episode 307
episodes.overview: The LIZARD LICK crew lose their food truck and start the investigation to see who took it.

episodes.name: Episode 308
episodes.overview: Ron and Bobby saddle up for a repo at a rodeo, Krazy Dave and Amy set up the newly single Bobby on a blind date

episodes.name: Episode 309
episodes.overview: A van job at a little-girls' beauty pageant turns out to be a real kick for Bobby, while Ron's surprise find in a repo brings back memories of his old dog. Later, Bobby's first date with Cassie may be ruined when a carnival-ride repo comes around.

episodes.name: Episode 310
episodes.overview: A repo turns X-rated on Krazy Dave; and Amy's intrusion into Bobby's love life throws their friendship for a loop.

episodes.name: Episode 311
episodes.overview: Real-estate developers threaten a local farmer with foreclosure, so Ron rides to the rescue to keep his hometown from being bulldozed, while Bobby fulfills a lifelong dream of getting behind the wheel of a famous TV-show vehicle.

episodes.name: Episode 312
episodes.overview: An old enemy resurfaces and attempts to sabotage Ron's big debate.

episodes.name: Episode 313
episodes.overview: Ron's opponent accuses him of wrong doing and a terrible mishap threatens the team.

episodes.name: Episode 314
episodes.overview: Bobby's in a car accident and goes to a hospital, and Ron and Amy await word on his condition.

episodes.name: Episode 321
episodes.overview: Ron and Bobby track-down an illegal bounty hunter with a history of violent behavior.

episodes.name: Episode 322
episodes.overview: While Bobby causes trouble at the police station, Amy digs-up more incriminating evidence against Mayor Sam Davis.

episodes.name: Episode 323
episodes.overview: Bobby goes too far when he confronts the man who broke into his house and Krazy Dave attempts to single-handedly repo an 18-wheeler.

episodes.name: Episode 324
episodes.overview: Ron takes Amy on a second honeymoon.

episodes.name: Episode 325
episodes.overview: Ron's shoddy attempt at a second honeymoon gets him in hot water with Amy-and Bobby makes a mess of the business when he's left in-charge.

episodes.name: Season Premiere
episodes.overview: In the season premiere, Ron and Amy's repo competition takes a dangerous turn when Amy goes missing... while Bobby's fate is sealed when the judge rules his felony charges.

episodes.name: Christmas Special
episodes.overview: Finding A Christmas tree takes a frightening turn when one of the Shirley Children goes missing in the woods... and Bobby plays Santa to a family in need.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Bobby confronts his past when he recieves an invite for a "Back to the 80's" party and is forced to face his past tormentors.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Amy is boiling mad at Bobby for hurting Big Juicy's feelings when he dumps her for another woman,and the Lizard Lick crew rally to help a single mother living out of her car.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The Lizard Lick crew reval a life changing surprise for a homeless mother and her kids.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Bobby confronts a female stalker on a hot first date.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Ron and Bobby throw down in the middle of a scrap yard and later give a job to one of their debtors.

episodes.name: Series Finale
episodes.overview: In the season finale, Bobby comes to blows with Ronnie when he secretly starts his own towing business.
